title: AutoPatcher_XP_Feb07_GRE
description:
This is the last official released version of AutoPatcher for Windows XP x86 (32bit) Greek Version
just before MS pulled the plug (shame on them...)

IMHO autopatcher was (and still is) a great tool that facilitates the installation and maintenance
of every windows installation 
(once available for 2003 , XP and Vista , for x86 and x64 versions and several versions of Office suite)
useful for every legit user of these platforms 
it has nothing to do with piracy or pirated versions of windows 
it is just an accumulation of all the freely available patches in one place
ah , good old times...
and we should ask ourselves why MS is shooting down a project like that , 
since it was made to serve their platforms in a way MS doesn&#039;t (go figure)

anyway , AutoPatcher is not dead , it&#039;s still alive and kickin&#039; (a$$)
just check the forums at www.autopatcher.com

This is just for everyone that needs the Greek version of AutoPatcher for Windows XP x86 (32bit)
(it won&#039;t install in any other language of windows, or other architecture)
and updates any greek installation of windows that has SP2 up to February 2007 (a bit old I Know)
after that you just need to check at windows/microsoft update to download a few more patches
for the adventurous out there you can extract this package (just execute it and it will extract its files)
and combine the resulting folder with the online version of autopatcher 
don&#039;t know if it&#039;ll work (check the autopatcher forums), but that&#039;s still the only way for offline update
especially since the rc versions of XP SP3 (and the final coming soon - this week?)
are not available at all in greek language

File details:

AutoPatcher_XP_Feb07_GRE_Full.exe
307 MB (322494401 bytes)
CRC32 : 8BCE5A3D
MD5   :	7A170E6B827DE23DCCAC759B3235EFAA
SHA1  :	11A67841FEC978940E7D0296BC3FAA019136B278

hashtab2_setup.exe
a really helpful utility that calculates several (a lot) of popular hashes
of any file to confirm it&#039;s authenticity 
just install it and you can check the file hashes from a tab in the properties window
(right click a file -> properties -> File Hashes) <a href="
http://beeblebrox.org/hashtab/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://beeblebrox.org/hashtab/</a>

A big thanks to the AutoPatcher Team
and especially to the greek members
Thanks raptor (aka Antonis) 
RESPECT dude
